2025 Year in Review

      
    


    


  

    
As we start a new year, it's a good time to reflect on what we accomplished in 2025.


Research Milestones


Several research projects reached important milestones this year. The work on robust visual navigation showed particularly promising results.


Personal Projects


I launched several side projects, including this website redesign. The new static site approach has been working well.


Learning and Growth


The year was filled with learning opportunities, from exploring new web technologies to diving deeper into machine learning research.


Here's to another year of progress and discovery!
